newsitem.title: VIETNAM: Vietnam-Macau air link set to open next month.
newsitem.headline: Vietnam-Macau air link set to open next month.

text.p: Vietnam's Pacific Airlines will start a twice-a-week service to Macau from Ho Chi Minh City next month, an official at the carrier said on Tuesday.
Flights will leave for the Portuguese colony every Monday and Friday and return, via the Vietnamese central coast city of Danang, on the same day.
Pacific Airlines, a joint-stock company whose shareholders are state-owned corporations, is dwarfed by its state-owned rival and flag carrier, Vietnam Airlines.
It currently operates on domestic flights between Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City and Danang and also flies to Taipei and Kaoshiung in Taiwan.
